speaker: customer
dialogue: Those seagulls... \nstealing your food

speaker: customer
dialogue: They are annoying, \nthey have always been.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Many years ago, \nattacked by seagulls I was.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Seagulls! \nStop it now!

speaker: cook
dialogue: ehhh.. \nWho are you??!

speaker: customer
dialogue: You must be the owner of \nour last food stand on the beach

speaker: customer
dialogue: Don't worry, \nI'll help you to protect this stand

speaker: cook
dialogue: No I'm just passing by…

speaker: customer
dialogue: But I need energy to protect! \nCook me Anything!

speaker: cook
dialogue: I said I'm just passing…

speaker: customer
dialogue: Drag some food to the plate\n and COOK!

speaker: cook
dialogue: Those seagulls pecked his brain too many times..

speaker: customer
dialogue: You get a new recipe, \nyou can check them in the recipes.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Keep trying different combinations.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Before that, \nthe food is getting cold!

speaker: customer
dialogue: Give it to me give it to me

speaker: customer
dialogue: I'm happy with any food.

speaker: customer
dialogue: But some people \nmight have their preference.

speaker: customer
dialogue: And different food gives different buff.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Check before you cook!

speaker: customer
dialogue: I'll start fighting those seagulls for you!

speaker: customer
dialogue: That's all. \nChasing seagulls away \nor they will take your food.

speaker: customer
dialogue: see ya!
